email_subject: RE: Do you want me to take you off my e-mail distribution list?
email_body: Please keep me on your list. -----Original Message----- From: Cantrell, Rebecca Sent: Wednesday, June 20, 2001 2:59 PM To: Allen, Phillip K. Subject: Do you want me to take you off my e-mail distribution list? I've noticed that you are deleting a lot of the messages without reading them. I can take you off my master list if you'd like.
